short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens all unread SomethingAwful bookmarks in seperate tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Used to open all unread SomethingAwful bookmarks in separate tabs with one click.

1) Go to the user control panel where bookmarks are
2) Click the grenade in the address bar
3) Read all the bad posts
